name: Social Media Posts & Ads template (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
description:
These are all the sizes you need for your Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn Ads & Posts.


What you need to do:


1.Duplicate the file

2.Replace the elements with your own

3.Export PNG files


*If you found this from our website follow the instructions on the video tutorial you have received!


And you're done!


Sizes Included

FACEBOOK:

- Facebook post square: 1200x1200

- Facebook portrait 630x1200

- Facebook portrait 1080x1920

- Facebook landscape 1200x630

INSTAGRAM

- Instagram post square 1080x1080

- Instagram portrait 1080x1350

- Instagram story 1080x1920

- Instagram landscape 1080x566

LINKEDIN:

- Linked in post square 1200x1200

- Linked in portrait 627x1200

- Linked in story 1080x1920

- Linked in landscape 1200x627


Enjoy!
